text: Charles Deacey (6 October 1889 – 1952) was an English professional footballer who played as a centre-half. ==References== Category:1889 births Category:1952 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Wednesbury Category:English footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Wednesbury Town F.C. players Category:Wednesbury Old Athletic F.C. players Category:West Bromwich Albion F.C. players Category:Hull City A.F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Pontypridd F.C. players Category:Merthyr Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Charlie Deacey
